name: Mad Mind
description:
Mad Mind is a 2D platformer game where 1 player must escape the vicious traps of 4 other players !

You are a patient in a psychiatric hospital from which you must escape ! But the sadistic doctors will do everything to kill you !

Try to reach the end of the level while other players with bad intentions will try to stop you !

______________________________________________________________

Mad Mind is a game developed by students of IIM as part of a 4 days Game Jam on the theme of retro and sadism.

___________________________________________________
